text: Postupalovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Ivano-Kazansky Selsoviet, Iglinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 70 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 26 km from Iglino, 4 km from Ivano-Kazanka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Iglinsky District
title: Postupalovo
